entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
A hello world is a short program which demonstrates:

  • that the program is working properly
  • the simplest sort of input/output
  • the minimum amount of effort needed to demonstrate to the programmer that s/he has done something.

This post is such a "program".

Liquid error: undefined method `Py_IsInitialized' for RubyPython::Python:Module
